content:
Strength:
20min to build a heavy Clean and Jerk

Metcon:
For Time:
30 Hang Clean and Jerks (#70/45)

*Every time the bar is dropped perform 100 Double Unders

Weightlifting:
-Snatch balance
(60%) 3×5
(70%) 3×3

-Hang snatch below the knees
(60%) 3×5
(70%) 3×3

-Front squat + power jerk
(60%) 3+1 /3
(65%) 2+1 /3
(70%) 2+1 /2
(80%) 1+1 /1

Competitors:
A. 6 Sets of 2:
3-Pause Power Clean (2sec pause)

Pause #1 - Knee Level
Pause #2 - Jumping Position
Pause #3 - Receiving Position

B. "Fran"
21-15-9
Thrusters (#43/30)
Pullups

C.
For time:
500-400-300-200-100m Row
15 GHD Situps
